author: wsjcom
title: Penalize the Disrupters, Not The Speakers or Free Speech
text:
Regarding your editorial “Free Speech Gets Expensive” (Feb. 10), the Journal’s “Free Speech: Colleges in the Crossfire, Moving Upstream” video appearing the same day is instructive: We see befuddled, cowering police passively allowing masked protesters to “rampage against a speech by Milo Yiannopoulos,” tearing apart barrier fences, setting off smoke bombs and shattering windows.
A simple solution is to support First Amendment free-speech rights of both speakers and protesters, while simultaneously requiring lawful behavior... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
